attributes.action: allow children of single parents just above the EMA threshold the minimum of £10 a week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think this system is, quite franky, a joke. My mother is a single parent just above the threshold and we are really struggling. The council (Redcar and Cleveland) won't help with transport fees - the bus fares are currently £13 a week which is £52 a month, on top of having to pay for College fees. What is unfair is seeing my College friends waste their EMA on rubbish. Worse still, is the fact THE THRESHOLD HAS NOT GONE UP IN THREE YEARS WHEN PEOPLE'S WAGES HAVE GONE UP.
